attributes.action: Welcome Mr Donal Trump, Pesident of the United States of America to the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Her Majesty the Queen has issued the invitation to Mr Trump and we want to ensure he is welcomed on his arrival.
attributes.background: Mr Trump is the POTUS and as such an important friend to the UK. The USA and the U.K. Share a special relationship that is capable of generating many mutual benefits for both nations. Some negative comments have been raised and this is to show our support to Mr Trump and the USA.
